events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position successfully and will begin the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills in software development.
A recruiter from the Engineering team, John Smith, has been assigned to your application and will reach out to you for the next steps.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully. We discussed your background and technical expertise in software engineering.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the technical interview scheduled as per our recommendation.
Your technical interview is scheduled for May 20th at 3 PM UTC with our lead developer to assess your coding skills.
You completed the technical interview. Your problem-solving approach and coding skills were impressive and aligned with our expectations.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 25th at 10 AM to discuss company culture, benefits, and any remaining questions you may have.
You have successfully completed the HR interview. The team noted your enthusiasm and alignment with the company values.
We are excited to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are glad to hear the terms meet your expectations and interests.
You have accepted the offer. We look forward to welcoming you on board as a new member of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started. Please complete all required documents and training modules as per instructions.
The recruitment process is now officially closed with your successful hire. Welcome again to the team and best wishes for your future.
